message:
🕉️ Om Shri Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

Shri Amarapur Asthan, Jaipur

**Holi Festival**

**14th March, 2025 (Friday)**

 Schedule

| **Program**            | **Time**       |
|------------------------|--------------|
| Mangala Darshan        | 6:00 AM |
| Satsang Pravachan      | 7:00 AM - 9:00 AM |
| Phoolon Ki Holi   | 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM |
| Shayan     | 12:00 PM - 3:00 PM |
| Bhajan Sankirtan  | 4:30 PM - 6:00 PM |
| Sandhya Aarti   | 6:00 PM - 6:30 PM |
| Darshan  | 3:00 PM - 9:00 PM |
| Shayan | 9:00 PM |

**Note:**- Devotees are kindly requested **not** to bring colors or gulal!
- Only **Floral** 🌹🌷🌸🌼 Holi will be celebrated!!
